creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
In http://ant.apache.org/external.html, the Freemarker Pre-Processor should be
mentioned since it wonderfully integrates with ANT (--> see
http://fmpp.sourceforge.net/ant.html) and is a very powerful tool!

creator: ddekany@freemail.hu
text:
er... I'm the author of FMPP. Ralf, thanks for supporting FMPP, but I don't 
think it's an Ant bug. But, anyway, thanks for the tip... just don't annoy Ant 
developers, OK? :)
